subject: RE: 145023-Bank 2 Vs. CGML
content: Hi,   The cash balance is not rounded due your payment of 14.08.18   Please pay always with 10k rounded amount.   In order to keep the cash balance rounded we will pay 1.811.829 EUR v.d. 22.08.18     Regards.   Xxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx   xxxx 2 – xxx 1111-1111     Xxxxx xx xxxx, 11    11111 xxxx xxxx xxxxx xxxxx   Tel 111 111 111 ext. 11111     Intl. Call: 1111 11 111 11111 ext. 11111 xxxxxxx@bank2.com         De: XXXXXXX@XXXX.xxx [mailto: XXXXXXX@XXXX.xxx] Enviado el: xxxxxxx 11 xxxxxxxx 1111 Para: XXXXXXX@XXXX.xxx; 1111 Xxxxxxxx, XX.XX. CC: XXXXXXX@XXXX.xxx Asunto: 145023-Bank 2 Vs. CGML     Please advise on attached margin call. Thanks & Regards, XXXXX XXXXX CGML XXXXXXX@XXXX.xxx Group Email: XXXXXXX@XXXX.xxx Group Tel#: +11-11-1111-1111 The information contained in this electronic message and any attachments (the \"Message\") is intended for one or more specific individuals or entities, and may be confidential, proprietary, or otherwise protected by law.
